mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id, member_pw, member_nickname, member_birth, member_gender, member_contact) values( #{memberId}, #{memberPw},#{memberNickname}, #{memberBirth},#{memberGender}, #{memberContact})
mapper.update: update member set member_pw = #{memberPw} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_nickname from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from member WHERE INSTR(LOWER(member_nickname), LOWER(#{memberNickname})) > 0
